Topic.Title: Beta testers needed for IFComp 2019 entry

Posts.EditableText:
Hi All,

If anyone is interested in beta testing my IFcomp entry for this year, please message me.

It is a puzzle parser, written in Inform 7.

There shouldn't be too much bug hunting (famous last words!), but feedback on difficulty and general playability would be useful.
